00028 #ifndef _QICSTEXTCELLDISPLAY_H
00029 #define _QICSTEXTCELLDISPLAY_H

00032 
00033 #include <qpainter.h>
00034 #include <qlineedit.h>
00035 
00036 
00037 
00038 class QicsGrid;
00039 class QicsGridInfo;
00040 
00070 class QicsTextCellDisplay: public QObject,
00071                        public QicsMovableEntryWidgetCellDisplay
00072 {
00073 Q_OBJECT
00074 
00075 public:
00079     QicsTextCellDisplay();
00080     virtual ~QicsTextCellDisplay();
00081 
00082     virtual void displayCell(QicsGrid *grid, int row, int col,
00083                  const QicsDataItem *itm,
00084                  const QRect &rect, QPainter *painter);
00085     virtual void startEdit(QicsScreenGrid *, int row, int col,
00086                const QicsDataItem *itm);
00087 
00088     virtual void endEdit(QicsScreenGrid *, int row, int col);
00089 
00090     inline virtual bool editWhenCurrent(void) const { return false; }
00091 
00092     virtual bool isEmpty(QicsGridInfo *info, int row, int col,
00093              const QicsDataItem *itm) const;
00094 
00101     virtual bool handleKeyEvent(QicsScreenGrid *grid, int row, int col,
00102                 QKeyEvent *ke);
00103 
00104     virtual QSize sizeHint(QicsGrid *grid, int row, int col,
00105                const QicsDataItem *itm);
00106 
00107     virtual QString tooltipText(QicsGridInfo *info, int row, int col,
00108                 const QicsDataItem *itm, const QRect &rect) const; 
00109 
00110 protected:
00111     QWidget *newEntryWidget(QicsScreenGrid *grid);
00112 
00124     virtual QString textToDisplay(QicsGridInfo *info, int row, int col,
00125                   const QicsDataItem *itm) const;
00126 
00137     virtual QPixmap pixmapToDisplay(QicsGridInfo *info, int row, int col,
00138                     const QicsDataItem *itm) const;
00139 
00153     virtual bool canDisplayAll(QicsGridInfo *info,
00154                    const QRect &rect, int row, int col,
00155                    const QString &text, int text_flags,
00156                    const QFont &font,
00157                    const QPixmap &pix) const;
00158 
00162     virtual bool eventFilter(QObject *o, QEvent *e);
00163 
00169     virtual bool setValue(QicsEntryWidgetInfo *info);
00170 
00175     virtual void resetValue(QicsEntryWidgetInfo *info);
00176 
00178     QEvent *myLastEvent;
00179 };
